title: Task 50

answers.answer: This are my glasses and those is my hat.
answers.feedback: Remember the context in which this and those are used. Look for a sentence that uses both pronouns appropriately.

answers.answer: This is my phone and those are my keys.
Those is my notebook next to this pencils.

answers.answer: This trees are tall next to those building.
answers.feedback: Remember the context in which this and those are used. Look for a sentence that uses both pronouns appropriately.

description: Understanding when to use this or those is crucial. Remember, this is for singular items close to you, and those is for plural items further away or not the main topic of discussion.
